Jobs.title: PROJECT MANAGER (CONSULT) - PETROBRAS
Jobs.description: ', 'CONSULTANT MANAGEMENT PROGRAM MANAGER & PROJECT MANAGER of strategical projects of engineering of the wallet of Investments of PETROBRAS in the Program of responsible Excellency of Projects for the management of PEOPLE (qualification, training and management of the change), PROCESSES (methodology of management of projects, model of organizacional maturity) and TECHNOLOGY (tools for management of projects and management of porfólios). Management of exploration projects and production of ENERGY & OIL AND GAS ( uspstream) and Management of projects dowstream (Refining, Transpetro) and GAMES PAN 2007 (Ernst Young)', '

Jobs.title: PROJECT MANAGER (CONSULT)
Jobs.description: ', 'Sector AERONAUTIC / PUBLIC MANAGEMENT Project Manager & PMO', 'SIVAM/ATech – Critical Technology Foundation/DECEA', 'MINISTRY OF HEALTH/ WORLD BANK', 'SEBRAE', 'ESCOLA DE GOVERNO DO MATO GROSSO', '

Jobs.title: PROJECT COORDINATION
Jobs.description: ', 'Sector TELECOMMUNICATION Project Coordination SITE ACQUISITION, REAL STATE TURN-KEY', 'SIEMENS, VÉSPER', '', 'CONSTRUCTION , URBAN DEVELOPMENT', 'Trainee Engineer - GOVERNMENT', '

summary: ', '- MSC* Project Manager - Politécnica - USP, MBA Business Management FGV, Civil Engineering UNESP, 5 years CNPq/PIBIC - 5 years scholarship UNESP, CANADA/BRASIL', '- •12,5 years of experience as Project Manager & PMO working with complex projects portfolio employing PMBOK’s 9 fields of knowledge sectors: oil & energy (petroleum/gas), aeronautics engineering, telecom engineering, public management, education and industrial engineering.', '•Project manager & PMO of a Portfolio of US$ 7,9 bilhões reais with 2.570 turnkey projects (EPC) according to PMI concepts of project life cycle. Clients: PETROBRAS, SIEMENS, SIVAM/ATECH, VÉSPER, UNIEMP, SEBRAE, STEFANINI TRAINING, World Bank, Ministry of Health , Brazilian Government and ITA ( AeronauticTechnological Institute), DOW CHEMICAL', '•Academic teacher of project management at ITA – Aeronautic Tecnological Institute, and at PETROBRAS for 160 employees.', '•Planning, Implementation and Control of new business, industrial plants and Project management systems. ', '•SAP R/3 PS (EMP278 and EMP258), MM, PM and BW, MS Project Professional and Server (EPM), Primavera Enterprise P6, PertMaster, SIG, CAPRI (Oracle), Excel, Power Point, Access, SIG, Fortran and SAP R/3 ABAP, Visio and Intranet and SIGnet, GITEC, ControlTub, Exall, Supri-Br, Proje-BR, SIGEM, SGC, SHARE POINT', '•Conhecimentos: ISO 9001, OHSAS 18001, NBR ISSO 14001, SA8000, ISP CODE, IPA, ASME, API 650, AACEI (AACE international – Association for the Advancement of Cost Engineering), BSC – Balanced Scared Cord, CII – Construction Industry Institute, EVTEA, EIA-RIMA, Sistema Petrobras (NORTEC, PRODEP, MAGES, SIGET, PLANGAS, procedimentos, QSMSR), Sistema SIEMENS e DOW CHEMICAL', '
